content:
From: Lukas Bulwahn <bulwahn@in.tum.de>
There is currently no support for this in the Haskell code generation
that I am aware of.
If there is more than one user requiring this, it might be worth adding
this to the serializer.

Lukas

From: Christian Sternagel <christian.sternagel@uibk.ac.at>
Hi,

is there a way to declare fields of datatype constructors as strict for
Haskell code-generation?

cheers

chris
